$AMD Many r expecting a morning dip and will then pounce.  If no dip, would u buy @ 13.25 or risk missing the boat?
$AMD I am long AMD joined back in march. not leaving at lease till 2019 stock price 50+ watchers 150000+.being long gives you peace of mind
$AMD My prediction. The entire market is going to be in the green Friday. Comey testimony was such a letdown to the Dems it was embarrassing
$AMD I am ready to face the future!
$AMD DOW & S&P are green and NDX inching to green soon.
$AMD
$AMD please Lisa, I want to see Jack Ma Alibaba CEO at eypc launch to announce this official with demonstration
$AMD I just had his memo leaked to me on that exactly.

message.body: $AMD just hold for tomorrow, comey and Nividia will take care of the shorts

$AMD Many r expecting a morning dip and will then pounce.  If no dip, would u buy @ 13.25 or risk missing the boat?
$AMD I am long AMD joined back in march. not leaving at lease till 2019 stock price 50+ watchers 150000+.being long gives you peace of mind
$AMD My prediction. The entire market is going to be in the green Friday. Comey testimony was such a letdown to the Dems it was embarrassing
$AMD I am ready to face the future!
$AMD DOW & S&P are green and NDX inching to green soon.
$AMD
$AMD please Lisa, I want to see Jack Ma Alibaba CEO at eypc launch to announce this official with demonstration
$AMD I just had his memo leaked to me on that exactly.

message.body: $AMD just hold for tomorrow, comey and Nividia will take care of the shorts
